project.strategy

Class Greed

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.strategy.GreedyStrategy
      • project.strategy.Greed
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Strategy

    public class Greed
extends GreedyStrategy
    This class represent the concrete class for the greedy player strategy, greedy player always try to get more lantern cards, and to make dedication, so greedy player tries to choose a solution, which can get it more lantern cards and favor tokens.
    Author:
    Nirav
    See Also:

      • getPriorityBonusPlaceLakeTile

        public int getPriorityBonusPlaceLakeTile(LakeTile active_laketile,
                                         java.util.HashMap<Rotation,java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object>> adjacent_colors,
                                         Game game)
                                  throws RotationNotExistedException
        This method give bonus lake tile if two color of the same are facing each other, and increase the counter value based on the lantern cards a player can get
        Parameters:
        active_laketile - lake tile on the play area
        adjacent_colors - adjacent colors of all lake tiles nearby the active lake tile
